comment: come on, you can air your beefs with Trump, but you can't say with a straight face that he won't be remembered. Whatever else Trump accomplishes, he will go into the history books as a paradigm-shifting larger than life President.
amr:

                                    :op1 "Trump"))))
            :ARG2 (p3 / possible-01

                        :ARG1 (r / remember-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 p2)
                        :manner (f / face
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / straight-04)))))
      :snt3 (w / whatever

      :mod (e / else)

                  :ARG2 (l / large)

                  :ARG4 (l2 / life))))

comment: What will historians really write about Trump that would be relevant to people born years in the future? Quips and tearing down easily forgettable current political figures such as Warren is only memorable to people currently alive.
amr:
